buildings.name: Old GPU
buildings.description: Better for a museum than mining, but jokes on the GPU, you don't pay electricity, so it's basically free money! Yay!

buildings.name: Low-end GPU
buildings.description: Probably leftovers from a kid's old gaming rig, with this you can at least launch Minecraft without it crashing.

buildings.name: GPU
buildings.description: Finally some POWAH! This is considered the norm for gaming, that's plenty for mining!
